title: B&W typeface ID please
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeid_3949.png)

please help identify this type

thanks

-Z.

 [‹ Moby's New Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050559/http:/typophile.com/node/50358 "Go to previous forum topic") [Does anybody know what this font is? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050559/http:/typophile.com/node/50357 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hullcrushdepth

comments.content: This is likely hand drawn for the logo. [Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013050559/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_franklin_gothic_std_heavy/?sample_text=B%26W&sample_size=60) is close.
